Dm_ZE_0004_Text_005_b:
But if you, like Sonia, have a secret stone and are able
to manipulate time, then your story makes sense.
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_011_bb:
You had said that you needed to return to
your era as soon as you possibly could...
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_013_b: In my time, something terrible is happening...
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_023_b: I don't know what to say...
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_008_b:
Additionally, I sense that we share a
blood connection.
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_019_b:
We'll tell everyone that you're...a distant relative
of ours.
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_029_b:
And like us, my older sister has a secret stone.
We'll call on her.
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_003_c:
So it's true. This is really the era of
Hyrule's founding?
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_021_b: We'll get you fresh clothes too.
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_006_b:
Oh? I believed her right away. You needed the secret
stone as proof, Rauru?
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_005_ab: Your presence here is just as strange to us, Zelda.
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_017_b:
You don't need to solve your problems all at once.
Why not come back with us to the castle?
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_001_b: This is not the world I know.
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_014_bab: I need to get back there, but how do I do that?
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_027_c:
Yes... She knows far more than anyone about
our people.
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_014_bac: I don't even know how I got here in the first place.
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_022_b:
I'm sure an answer will come to you. Wisdom
takes time.
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_007_b:
I can feel your light power within her. As well as my
time power.
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_025_c:
Mineru... She may have some idea of how
to get you back to your era.
Dm_ZE_0004_Text_002_b: A time so far back in the past, it's become legend...
